qas.question: Who took over the package from Sentana?

answers.text: ESPN took over the package Setanta
The 2011 final was also shown live on Sky 3D in addition to ESPN

qas.question: Does ESPN still hold the contract?

answers.text: Following the sale of ESPN's UK and Ireland channels to BT, ESPN's rights package transferred to BT Sport

qas.question: What year did this take place?

What final was not shown live?
Who did BT Sport transfer the rights package to?
Who bought BT's UK and Ireland channels?
